author: Denise Hruby, Denise Hruby
title: 'People are afraid': Empty streets in Austria as country reopens shops and eases lockdown
description: Coronavirus has crippled country's economy and shop owners are afraid that people will continue to stay away despite lifting of restriction. Denise Hruby reports from Vienna.
content:
On the streets of Mariahilfer Strasse, a shopping boulevard in the centre of Vienna, only a small number of people donning facemasks stroll past stores.
Shops began reopening across Austria on Tuesday after the country started to loosen restrictions after a … [+5303 chars]
